title: Best Buy Featured Outlet Sales: Save on TVs, Vacuums, Lego Sets and More
description: No Prime membership? No problem. Shop these major discounts at Best Buy.
author: Aashna Gheewalla
byline: Aashna Gheewalla, Matt Poskitt, Amber Guetebier, Jason Coles
excerpt: No Prime membership? No problem. Shop these major discounts at Best Buy.
text: $250 at Best Buy Arlo Pro 5S indoor/outdoor security camera bundle: $250 Save $250 $570 at Best Buy Samsung 75-inch DU6900 series Crystal 4K smart Tizen TV: $570 Save $130 Just because Amazon's October Prime Day event has ended doesn't mean you can't still find deals at Amazon or other retailers. If you're looking for new tech -- whether a laptop or an air fryer -- Best Buy is the place to go right now, as its outlet sale is still stocked with tons of deals. From Dyson to Apple, these are the Best Buy deals to shop before the sale ends tonight (Oct. 10). Best Buy is currently giving you a chance to save on everything from big-ticket items to budget-friendly gadgets. You'll also find some top-rated items on sale, such as the M3 MacBook Air 13-inch, which is currently at a $200 discount. If you're a tech fiend or need a new home or kitchen appliance, Best Buy also has discounts on TVs, laptops, security cameras, headphones and more. Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money. Though you don't need a Best Buy membership to shop for most of the discounts right now, having a My Best Buy Plus or Total membership can score you some additional savings on select items. We've found some of the top deals available and will continue to update this page with more savings as new offers appear and others expire, so you can find all the best deals. Our favorite Best Buy 48-Hour Flash Sale deals right now While the HP Victus 15.6 didn't earn a spot on our list of the best gaming laptops, it's still a great, affordable option for gamers. From fast charging to rich audio, it's surprisingly robust for this low, low price. Looking to upgrade to a bigger screen? Nab this ultralarge 75-inch TV at a $130 discount right now. This 2024 TV has 4K resolution, HDR and HDR10 Plus. Having a little peace of mind goes a long way, and one great way to get some is by installing security cameras around your home so that you can keep an eye on things when you're away or you're drifting off to sleep. This bundle includes three Arlo Pro 5S security cameras for indoors or outdoors, along with four rechargeable batteries, three anti-theft camera mounts and a dual battery charging station. If a bigger screen is on your wish list, this 75-inch Bravia won't disappoint, with four times the pixels of full HD and superior brightness thanks to Sony's mini-LED (think OLED-lite) technology. Lenovo Ideapad 1i touchscreen laptop: $330 (save $170). Take half off this laptop and score a free three-month membership to Norton 360 and one month to Xbox GamePass. Samsung HW-Q850D 7.1.2-channel Q-series soundbar: $750 (save $350). Overhaul your movie nights with this soundbar kit for an immersive sound experience.Arlo Pro 5S Indoor/Outdoor security camera bundle: $250 (save $250). Keep an eye on your home no matter where you are.Apple MacBook Air M2 13.6-inch: $749 (save $250). Apple products rarely gets discounts, so take advantage of a chance to get the M2 MacBook Air for a lower price.Beats Powerbeats Pro wireless earbuds: $150 (save $50). These top-rated earbuds feature adjustable earhooks and up to 9 hours of listening time between charges. Best Buy also offers trade-in savings if you have an eligible device to swap.Dell Inspiron 15: $550 (save $200). A decent 15.6-inch screen with 16GB of RAM and 1TB storage. Our favorite Best Buy TV deals Whether for watching Sunday football or streaming the latest Netflix series, this 75-inch Samsung TV has 4K resolution and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast. It's an amazing bargain at less than $600. The Toshiba C350 Fire TV has 4K resolution, a Regza engine that powers its high performance, Dolby Vision HDR, Dolby Vision Atmos, and a bezel-less design. Insignia 58-inch F30 series smart Fire TV: $240 (save $140). Nab a 58-inch screen for your entertainment hub for under $250 and get Amazon's Fire platform.LG 65-inch C3 series TV: $1,300 (save $300). This massive TV has 4K visuals, plenty of features and Alexa integration.Samsung 75-inch DU6900 series smart TV: $570 (save $130). A nice big screen just in time for football season.Toshiba 65-inch Class C350 4K Fire TV: $350 (save $70). A decent size screen at a more than decent price.TCL 98-inch Q6 series 4K QLED Google TV: $2,000 (save $1,000). Feast your eyes on this giant screen for all your media and gaming needs.TCL 55-inch QM7 QD-Mini LED Google TV: $500 (save $300). This capable 55-inch TV from TCL gives you crisp 4K HDR content at a reasonable price. Our favorite Best Buy home and kitchen deals Getting your hands on your dream mixer is just a little closer to reality with this nearly $100 discount. Available in six different colors. Dyson V11 vacuum: $500 (save $70) This vacuum is cordless for ease of use, lightweight and can handle tough things like pet hair with ease.Fremo TP300 portable power station: $180 (save $90). Keep your devices charged during outages with this portable power station.Arozzi Arena curved gaming desk: $280 (save $120). Get your desktop gaming setup dialed in.Ninja Foodie 6-in-1 10-quart air fryer: $200 (save $50). This large-capacity air fryer is perfect for family meals.Shark HydroVac MessMaster cordless 3-in-1 mop and vacuum: $200 (save $100). If the name "messmaster" doesn't sell you, the price cut just might.Samsung smart music/picture frame: $300 (save $100). A Bluetooth picture and music frame which is compatible with Amazon Alexa, Bixby, and Google Assistant. Our favorite Best Buy appliance deals LG is one of the best brands, and this stainless steel smart refrigerator is down by a big $700. At 26.5 cubic feet capacity, it comes with a sleek minimalist design, ThinQ Care to keep the appliance in top shape, a built-in icemaker and LED panels, as well as LG Linear Cooling and Door Cooling Plus to keep produce fresh for twice as long. KitchenAid front control built-in dishwasher: $950 (save $265). Includes a third rack for more capacity.LG 4.5 cubic foot front loading stackable washing machine: $700 (save $200). Pair with the dryer below for a complete set.LG 7.4 cubic foot electric stackable dryer: $700 (save $200). Opt for the gas model and you can still save $200.GE smart stand mixer: $599 (save $200). A modern mixer that offers a handful of smart features such as remote monitoring and voice activation. Our favorite Best Buy toys and games deals Grab this PS5 edition of the Jedi saga and you'll soon be embroiled in a moral and physical battle with the Dark Side. Segway Ninebot F65 Kick Scooter: $625 (save $275). A 40.4-mile range scooter with a maximum speed of 18.6 mph, 10-inch pneumatic tires and a black finish.Save up to $14 on select Lego sets. No matter your age, Legos are an absolute joy. Star Ocean: The Second Story R, Switch: $30 (save $10). Take on your journey as either Claude or Rena and see how the perspectives and the allies you can recruit will change between characters.WWE 2K24 standard edition, Xbox: $30 (save $5). Relive some of the best moments and matches from WrestleMania. Jazwares 16-inch Fuyuki green squirrel Squishmallow: $20 (save $5). It's a toy, it's a pillow, it's a friend!GoTrax XR Pro commuting electric scooter: $450 (save $100). Cut your commute short with this electric scooter with a 19-mile operating range.Star Wars The Black Series Darth Revan Lightsaber: $195 (save $84). Kids and adults alike will love Darth Revan's awesome lightsaber.For more early deals you can shop right now, check out our roundup of the best Prime Day deals under $25. What are Best Buy's best deals? Just like the competitor sales, Best Buy is slashing prices in many categories throughout the entire store. This includes savings on tech gadgets, big appliances, home and kitchen tools, gaming gear and so much more. If you were looking to upgrade something around your home like a new TV, or replace your old headphones, now is the perfect time. Check out all the best deals Best Buy has to offer for everyone. We'll keep updating this page as more offers cycle in and out in the days ahead. These outlet deals re live until the end of today (Oct. 10). Do I need to be a My Best Buy member to shop Best Buy's current deals? No, savings are available to all shoppers, but keep in mind, Best Buy members may be able to score additional savings on top of already discounted prices or new savings altogether. Best Buy has three tiers of membership. My Best Buy is free, but won't provide you with any extra savings. My Best Buy Plus and Total memberships have an annual fee and will get you some extra discounts on select products. How do Prime Big Deal Days deals and competitor sales at other retailers compare with Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals?Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days and competitive sales at other major retailers have many similarities with Black Friday/Cyber Monday. Anecdotally, Black Friday tends to have better deals on large ticket items such as TVs, home appliances and laptops, while Prime Big Deal Days will tend to focus on more everyday essentials and items under $50. If you are looking for a good bargain on stuff you are likely to need all year round, buy them during Prime Big Deal Days, or check out their lingering deals as well. If you are looking for that "once-a-year" bargain, Black Friday is probably your best bet. If you want to beat the holiday rush, there will be plenty of items on sale that make great gifts for loved ones.
html:
$250 at Best Buy

Arlo Pro 5S indoor/outdoor security camera bundle: $250

Save $250

$570 at Best Buy

Samsung 75-inch DU6900 series Crystal 4K smart Tizen TV: $570

Save $130

Just because Amazon's October Prime Day event has ended doesn't mean you can't still find deals at Amazon or other retailers. If you're looking for new tech -- whether a laptop or an air fryer -- Best Buy is the place to go right now, as its outlet sale is still stocked with tons of deals. From Dyson to Apple, these are the Best Buy deals to shop before the sale ends tonight (Oct. 10).

Best Buy is currently giving you a chance to save on everything from big-ticket items to budget-friendly gadgets. You'll also find some top-rated items on sale, such as the M3 MacBook Air 13-inch, which is currently at a $200 discount. If you're a tech fiend or need a new home or kitchen appliance, Best Buy also has discounts on TVs, laptops, security cameras, headphones and more.

Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.

Though you don't need a Best Buy membership to shop for most of the discounts right now, having a My Best Buy Plus or Total membership can score you some additional savings on select items. We've found some of the top deals available and will continue to update this page with more savings as new offers appear and others expire, so you can find all the best deals.

Our favorite Best Buy 48-Hour Flash Sale deals right now

While the HP Victus 15.6 didn't earn a spot on our list of the best gaming laptops, it's still a great, affordable option for gamers. From fast charging to rich audio, it's surprisingly robust for this low, low price.

Looking to upgrade to a bigger screen? Nab this ultralarge 75-inch TV at a $130 discount right now. This 2024 TV has 4K resolution, HDR and HDR10 Plus.

Having a little peace of mind goes a long way, and one great way to get some is by installing security cameras around your home so that you can keep an eye on things when you're away or you're drifting off to sleep. This bundle includes three Arlo Pro 5S security cameras for indoors or outdoors, along with four rechargeable batteries, three anti-theft camera mounts and a dual battery charging station.

If a bigger screen is on your wish list, this 75-inch Bravia won't disappoint, with four times the pixels of full HD and superior brightness thanks to Sony's mini-LED (think OLED-lite) technology.

  • Lenovo Ideapad 1i touchscreen laptop: $330 (save $170). Take half off this laptop and score a free three-month membership to Norton 360 and one month to Xbox GamePass. 
  • Samsung HW-Q850D 7.1.2-channel Q-series soundbar: $750 (save $350). Overhaul your movie nights with this soundbar kit for an immersive sound experience.
  • Arlo Pro 5S Indoor/Outdoor security camera bundle: $250 (save $250). Keep an eye on your home no matter where you are.
  • Apple MacBook Air M2 13.6-inch: $749 (save $250). Apple products rarely gets discounts, so take advantage of a chance to get the M2 MacBook Air for a lower price.
  • Beats Powerbeats Pro wireless earbuds: $150 (save $50). These top-rated earbuds feature adjustable earhooks and up to 9 hours of listening time between charges. Best Buy also offers trade-in savings if you have an eligible device to swap.
  • Dell Inspiron 15: $550 (save $200). A decent 15.6-inch screen with 16GB of RAM and 1TB storage.

Our favorite Best Buy TV deals

Whether for watching Sunday football or streaming the latest Netflix series, this 75-inch Samsung TV has 4K resolution and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast. It's an amazing bargain at less than $600.

The Toshiba C350 Fire TV has 4K resolution, a Regza engine that powers its high performance, Dolby Vision HDR, Dolby Vision Atmos, and a bezel-less design.

  • Insignia 58-inch F30 series smart Fire TV: $240 (save $140). Nab a 58-inch screen for your entertainment hub for under $250 and get Amazon's Fire platform.
  • LG 65-inch C3 series TV: $1,300 (save $300). This massive TV has 4K visuals, plenty of features and Alexa integration.
  • Samsung 75-inch DU6900 series smart TV: $570 (save $130). A nice big screen just in time for football season.
  • Toshiba 65-inch Class C350 4K Fire TV: $350 (save $70). A decent size screen at a more than decent price.
  • TCL 98-inch Q6 series 4K QLED Google TV: $2,000 (save $1,000). Feast your eyes on this giant screen for all your media and gaming needs.
  • TCL 55-inch QM7 QD-Mini LED Google TV: $500 (save $300). This capable 55-inch TV from TCL gives you crisp 4K HDR content at a reasonable price.

Our favorite Best Buy home and kitchen deals

Getting your hands on your dream mixer is just a little closer to reality with this nearly $100 discount. Available in six different colors.

  • Dyson V11 vacuum: $500 (save $70) This vacuum is cordless for ease of use, lightweight and can handle tough things like pet hair with ease.
  • Fremo TP300 portable power station: $180 (save $90). Keep your devices charged during outages with this portable power station.
  • Arozzi Arena curved gaming desk: $280 (save $120). Get your desktop gaming setup dialed in.
  • Ninja Foodie 6-in-1 10-quart air fryer: $200 (save $50). This large-capacity air fryer is perfect for family meals.
  • Shark HydroVac MessMaster cordless 3-in-1 mop and vacuum: $200 (save $100). If the name "messmaster" doesn't sell you, the price cut just might.
  • Samsung smart music/picture frame: $300 (save $100). A Bluetooth picture and music frame which is compatible with Amazon Alexa, Bixby, and Google Assistant.

Our favorite Best Buy appliance deals

LG is one of the best brands, and this stainless steel smart refrigerator is down by a big $700. At 26.5 cubic feet capacity, it comes with a sleek minimalist design, ThinQ Care to keep the appliance in top shape, a built-in icemaker and LED panels, as well as LG Linear Cooling and Door Cooling Plus to keep produce fresh for twice as long.

  • KitchenAid front control built-in dishwasher: $950 (save $265). Includes a third rack for more capacity.
  • LG 4.5 cubic foot front loading stackable washing machine: $700 (save $200). Pair with the dryer below for a complete set.
  • LG 7.4 cubic foot electric stackable dryer: $700 (save $200). Opt for the gas model and you can still save $200.
  • GE smart stand mixer: $599 (save $200). A modern mixer that offers a handful of smart features such as remote monitoring and voice activation.

Our favorite Best Buy toys and games deals

Grab this PS5 edition of the Jedi saga and you'll soon be embroiled in a moral and physical battle with the Dark Side.

  • Segway Ninebot F65 Kick Scooter: $625 (save $275). A 40.4-mile range scooter with a maximum speed of 18.6 mph, 10-inch pneumatic tires and a black finish.
  • Save up to $14 on select Lego sets. No matter your age, Legos are an absolute joy. 
  • Star Ocean: The Second Story R, Switch: $30 (save $10). Take on your journey as either Claude or Rena and see how the perspectives and the allies you can recruit will change between characters.
  • WWE 2K24 standard edition, Xbox: $30 (save $5). Relive some of the best moments and matches from WrestleMania. 
  • Jazwares 16-inch Fuyuki green squirrel Squishmallow: $20 (save $5). It's a toy, it's a pillow, it's a friend!
  • GoTrax XR Pro commuting electric scooter: $450 (save $100). Cut your commute short with this electric scooter with a 19-mile operating range.
  • Star Wars The Black Series Darth Revan Lightsaber: $195 (save $84). Kids and adults alike will love Darth Revan's awesome lightsaber.

For more early deals you can shop right now, check out our roundup of the best Prime Day deals under $25.

What are Best Buy's best deals?

Just like the competitor sales, Best Buy is slashing prices in many categories throughout the entire store. This includes savings on tech gadgets, big appliances, home and kitchen tools, gaming gear and so much more. If you were looking to upgrade something around your home like a new TV, or replace your old headphones, now is the perfect time. Check out all the best deals Best Buy has to offer for everyone. We'll keep updating this page as more offers cycle in and out in the days ahead. These outlet deals re live until the end of today (Oct. 10).

Do I need to be a My Best Buy member to shop Best Buy's current deals?

No, savings are available to all shoppers, but keep in mind, Best Buy members may be able to score additional savings on top of already discounted prices or new savings altogether. Best Buy has three tiers of membership. My Best Buy is free, but won't provide you with any extra savings. My Best Buy Plus and Total memberships have an annual fee and will get you some extra discounts on select products.

How do Prime Big Deal Days deals and competitor sales at other retailers compare with Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals?

Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days and competitive sales at other major retailers have many similarities with Black Friday/Cyber Monday. Anecdotally, Black Friday tends to have better deals on large ticket items such as TVs, home appliances and laptops, while Prime Big Deal Days will tend to focus on more everyday essentials and items under $50.

If you are looking for a good bargain on stuff you are likely to need all year round, buy them during Prime Big Deal Days, or check out their lingering deals as well. If you are looking for that "once-a-year" bargain, Black Friday is probably your best bet. If you want to beat the holiday rush, there will be plenty of items on sale that make great gifts for loved ones.
